Name: ChatGPT Health
Tagline: ChatGPT designed for health and wellness
Description: A dedicated space for health conversations in ChatGPT. You can securely connect medical records and wellness apps so responses are grounded in your own health information. Designed to help you navigate medical care, not replace it.

Name: Livedocs
Tagline: The general data agent
Description: Livedocs is a general data agent that can do BI, ML, build dashboards, and write code and queries (anything a human data scientist would do!) Livedocs helps you understand your data instantly. Upload a CSV, spreadsheet, or connect your database, then ask questions in plain English. Livedocs uses AI to generate charts, metrics, and clear answers—no SQL, no dashboards, no setup. Built for anyone who needs insights fast, whether you’re technical or not. Just bring your data and start asking.

Name: Intrascope.app
Tagline: Centralize your team’s AI, cut costs and stay organized
Description: Intrascope is a shared AI workspace that helps teams stay organized, reduce costs, and keep all AI usage in one place. Admins set providers, limits, and rules, while the team works in a simple chat with shared context and reusable Manifests. No more scattered chats or separate API keys. AI becomes structured, predictable, and safe for the whole team.

Name: xPay
Tagline: Cross-border payment gateway for enterprises
Description: xPay is a powerful cross-border payment solution designed to help businesses in India, Singapore and the US seamlessly accept global payments. With 90% success rates, multi-currency support, and advanced fraud detection, xPay optimizes international transactions, reduces drop-offs, and automates compliance. Perfect for marketplaces, SaaS, and e-commerce, xPay simplifies complex payment flows and ensures a smooth, secure global experience for your business and customers.

Name: Biker 2.0: Bicycle track & maintain
Tagline: Bike AI garage: track and maintain bicycle parts
Description: Biker is a smart bike maintenance app that helps you keep track of your bikes and their components in one place. It turns your garage into a clear, organized system, helps you stay on top of maintenance, and connects you with nearby bike shops when it’s time for service. This version does three important things: - It removes “health analysis” promises you can’t fully prove - It emphasizes tracking, history, and clarity - It positions AI as a helper, not a magic oracle

Name: Flakes · Your next browser
Tagline: A keyboard-first, AI-powered native browser for macOS.
Description: Flakes is a macOS browser built for thinkers. Vim-style navigation, built-in ad blocking, a powerful command palette (⌘K), and AI that actually understands your tabs - but it's totally optional. Check more from our website: https://flakes.ai

Name: Muze AI
Tagline: Let AI Manage and Create Your Meta and Google ads
Description: Muze is an autonomous AI that creates, runs, and optimizes performance ads end to end. No agency. No media buyers. Just connect your site and ad accounts.

Name: PingPrompt
Tagline: Organize prompts, track changes, and iterate faster.
Description: Most people still manage important prompts in chat history, docs, and text files. PingPrompt keeps everything in one place, tracks every change, and helps you iterate without losing what already works. Refine prompts faster with a built-in copilot, compare versions with visual diffs, and test improvements with confidence. Built for agencies, creators, no-code/low-code builders, and marketers who depend on prompts every day.

Name: Awesome Gemini Prompts
Tagline: The Ultimate Open Source Library for Gemini & Nano
Topics: Open Source, Developer Tools, Artificial Intelligence, GitHub
Description: The first dedicated open-source prompt library for Google Gemini. Finding professional prompts for complex tasks was a pain—formatting was messy and scattered everywhere. So I built this to fix it. We automatically scraped & cleaned 1,100+ prompts using a custom LLM pipeline (Qwen + Gemini) to ensure quality everyday. It's completely free, open-source, and so cool to use.

Name: NexTalk
Tagline: The missing voice input for Linux. Beautiful Private Offline
Topics: Productivity, Developer Tools, Artificial Intelligence, GitHub
Description: A modern voice input tool built exclusively for Linux. Featuring a transparent "capsule" UI, 100% offline inference (Sherpa-onnx), and native Fcitx5 integration. Sub-20ms latency.

Name: Capacity
Tagline: Vibe Coding with a planning assistant to build with clarity
Description: Most AI app builders jump straight into building. That feels fast until your app gets messy, inconsistent, and nothing like what you imagined. Today, we’re introducing Spec Coding in Capacity. Instead of building immediately, Capacity now lets you define your app first with the help of an AI co-founder that asks the right questions before any code is generated. More structure upfront. Far less refactoring later. Much better results.

Name: Adventory
Tagline: The indie ad markeplace to sell or find ad spots
Description: Find indie apps that sell ad spots. Or list yours and get discovered. ## For app owners - List your app that has ad spots to sell - Get discovered by hundreds of SaaS founders - Get your app featured to appear on top of browsing results - Get a free backlink to boost your SEO ## For advertisers - Browse hundreds of apps that sell ad spots - Find the perfect spot to advertise your product - Review app analytics directly on our platform Looking to buy or sell ad space? Check out Adventory!

Name: Alias Bot
Tagline: Replace repeated @mentions in Slack with channel aliases
Description: Teams often end up typing long @Alice @Bob @Charlie mentions cluttering the channel. Sometimes, some people get missed or the wrong person gets tagged. This gets worse with rotating or short-lived teams (on-call, releases, incidents). Alias Bot lets you define channel-scoped aliases (e.g. !reviewers, !oncall) so mentions expand to the right people for that channel, without needing to manage org-wide user groups.

Name: Transcodes
Tagline: Authentication as a Service, Passwordless Passkey-First Auth
Description: Transcodes is an Authentication-as-a-Service platform for passkey-first, passwordless login and MFA. Users can sign in with passkeys, TOTP, or hardware authenticators (e.g., YubiKey via USB/NFC). It supports phishing-resistant authentication, admin MFA, and DPoP-bound access tokens without refresh tokens. Built for startups and small businesses, Transcodes works without requiring clients to integrate their own backend

Name: ChatSEO
Tagline: Find & prioritize your SEO wins by chatting with your data.
Description: The all-in-one SEO tool that connects to your Google Search Console and market data. Just ask any question and get clear, actionable next steps to grow your traffic in Google and AI search.

Name: FlexClip Magic Edit
Tagline: Stop manual editing. Start creating — instantly with AI.
Description: FlexClip Magic Edit is an AI-native workspace that reimagines video creation. With Auto Edit, instantly turn raw files into polished videos. With AI Recreate, quickly transform your media into fresh, professional videos. Tell your story faster — let AI do the heavy lifting.

Name: Prompts
Tagline: A writing app that doesn’t write for you
Description: Writing is one of the easiest ways for us to translate ambigous ideas and thoughts into tangingle form. Yet, it's become popular to outsource writing to AI tools. Apps that finish our sentences, smooth away uncertainty, and sound confident for us. Prompts isn't that kind of app. It doesn't generate content for you. It doesn't optimize your words or try to sound impressive. Instead, it asks quiet, thoughtful questions exactly when you need them. So you can keep writing, in your own words.

Name: SaaS for Newbies
Tagline: The missing technical manual for non-technical makers
Description: This is a mini (yet comprehensive) course on how you, too, can understand what an "API" means, or what developers mean when they say they're using certain "libraries", or what the difference between React.js and Next.js is. AI has made it easier than ever for non-developers to create their own mini apps. But it's hard to do it right without knowing how everything works together in the programming world. This free guide is here to change that.

Name: DevHive
Tagline: Find your profitable startup / micro-saas idea in minutes.
Description: Hardest part of being indie hacker or founder? Finding the next profitable startup or micro-saas idea. Stop guessing. DevHive turns Reddit into a repeatable research workflow: instantly scan founder traction, solution requests, and pain points across subreddits with high engagement and proofs of high success rate, save the winners, then generate a structured MVP + positioning + pricing plan from any thread. Find what people already want or what is already validated by others, then build it!

Name: EasyBTC
Tagline: NOT JUST ANOTHER STAKING APP
Description: Previously, this tool was only available to professionals, but our goal is to simplify it and make it accessible to our friends. We have put together the most secure system possible, the largest exchange in the world (Binance), and the most reliable cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin and USDT. Everything remains in your account without withdrawal. We earn money on Binance's funding rate, which brings in 5 to 10% per annum.
